Disease_stage/treatment: Fasting plasma small extracellular vesicles in patient D with diabetic foot ulcer before undergoing transverse tibial bone transport
Project_Description: Fasting plasma small extracellular vesicles were obtained from four patients with wagner 4 diabetic foot ulcers. These patients were treated with transverse tibial cortical distraction, and plasma samples were taken before and 14 days after the surgery.
